speaker.whotheyare: Kaeli Swift wants to know everything about crows, including what they can teach us about the evolution of cognition and social behaviors.
speaker.whylisten: Kaeli Swift researches what crows do around unfamiliar dead crows, and how this compares to the behaviors of other non-human social animals. Currently, she is a Post-Doctoral researcher in the School of Environmental and Forest Sciences at the University of Washington where she studies songbird ecology.
